My other half recently split up with me. 4 years have gone down the drain, she doesn't want a relationship anymore, doesn't feel the love. After plenty of arguing, she sent me this and says we could be like this. But how can I go from talking to someone 24/7, seeing eachother every other day and being madly in love.. to talking every now and again with no love at all? If you truly loved the person, you'll always want them to be yours. Being "friends" hardly ever works. I know it won't for us.
My teacher said this will be my leaving song

Nice amazing video
